name: stacknova-ai
description: Stacknova AI: Smart contracts for the pre-sale phase of SNOVA tokens, featuring dynamic pricing, secure transaction processing, and a referral system.

scripts.deploy:eth: NETWORK=eth npx hardhat run --network eth scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:bsc: NETWORK=bsc npx hardhat run --network bsc scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:polygon: NETWORK=polygon npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: NETWORK=arbitrum npx hardhat run --network arbitrum scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:avalanche: NETWORK=avalanche npx hardhat run --network avalanche scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:op: NETWORK=op npx hardhat run --network op scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.deploy:base: NETWORK=base npx hardhat run --network base scripts/deploy.ts

author: ILESKOV
